message.calculatorSectionDescription: Want to know how many calories your body needs? Our calculator considers your gender, age, height, weight, and activity level to determine your ideal daily calorie intake. Find out your basal metabolic rate (calories for basic bodily functions) and check if your weight is within the normal range using the body mass index (BMI). Simple, fast, and accurate – for your fitness goals!

calculationResult.calculatorSectionDescriptionOne: The calorie calculator calculated this result using modern capabilities based on the entered values, basal metabolic rate, and BMI index. This result is only a theoretical value. For a more accurate result, we recommend consulting with a specialist.
calculationResult.infoBlockText: Basal metabolism is the number of calories your body burns at rest to maintain vital functions.
calculationResult.infoBlockTextBMI: Body Mass Index (BMI) is the ratio of weight to height that helps assess whether body weight is within the normal range.
calculationResult.calculatorSectionCalorieAppPromotion: Record your food and see how many calories you consume in the Calorie Tables app.
calculationResult.calculatorSectionDescriptionAppBenefitsO: Have you been planning to lose weight for a long time? Or, conversely, do you have a low weight and would like to gain a few kilograms? The 'Calorie Table' calorie calculator will help you stick to your daily calorie norm and thus achieve the desired result!
calculationResult.calculatorSectionDescriptionAppBenefitsT: For this, you only need to eat healthy foods and record daily in the 'Calorie Table' app on your smartphone (download and use are free) what and how much you eat. Meanwhile, the 'Calorie Table' app does the following:

Calculates how many calories you need to consume daily to achieve your goal, taking into account your current weight, age, gender, activity, BMI index, and goal. The calorie calculator for weight loss will recommend a norm for comfortable and gradual weight loss, thanks to a moderate and safe calorie deficit. For muscle gain, a higher calorie intake than what the body burns will be recommended, and for maintaining weight – as many calories as are burned.
calculationResult.goalWeight: You will reach your desired weight in about:
calculationResult.calculatorSectionCalorieReason: This calorie intake is optimal for your body: it safely supports health, is comfortable for daily life, and helps you achieve your weight goals.
calculationResult.calorieDiaryAppHeading: Easily track your diet and weight in our app – your perfect results start here!
calculationResult.calorieDiaryAppParagraphOne: Our app features a 'Calorie Diary' where you can easily record everything you eat throughout the day. Find any product in the existing database or add your own option — this allows you to account for any unique dishes and ingredients.
calculationResult.calorieDiaryAppParagraphTwo: With intuitive statistics, you can track your calorie intake over various time periods (for example, monthly). The app highlights if you consume more than the recommended amount, slightly exceed it, or stay within a healthy range. This level of monitoring helps you adjust your diet in time and achieve your goals more quickly.
calculationResult.calorieDiaryAppParagraphThree: A special highlight is our chatbot, designed with convenience in mind. Connect our Telegram bot through your account, and input your meal data in just a few steps. Simply say out loud what you've eaten, and the bot will automatically transcribe your speech to text: it provides a list of products that you can edit right away if needed. If you haven't specified the product's weight, the bot suggests average values, and it can also generate macronutrients (calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates) via AI if required.
calculationResult.calorieDiaryAppParagraphFour: After making any final edits, you can save all your data to the 'Calorie Diary' with a single tap. You can also view daily statistics in the bot to stay on top of your progress. Using voice notes in Telegram saves time and eliminates the need to download another app or manually visit a website. All you need to do is open the messenger and dictate your list of foods.
calculationResult.calorieDiaryAppParagraphFive: If your goal is to count calories quickly, conveniently, and without extra hassle, our bot and the 'Calorie Diary' app are exactly what you need. Record your meals by voice and keep track of your nutrition — achieving results has never been easier!

FAQ.Title: FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
FAQ.Intro: Below is a collection of common questions and answers about Calories365. If you don't find the information you need, feel free to contact us at
FAQ.Section1Text: Calories365 is an online service and Telegram bot designed for convenient food diary management and nutritional control. We help you track calories, proteins, fats, and carbohydrates (macronutrients) in products and meals, along with providing daily, weekly, and monthly stats and analytics.
FAQ.Section2: 2. Which features are available in the app?
FAQ.List2_1: Food diary management: Add products, specify the amount consumed, and get automated calorie and macronutrient calculations.
FAQ.List2_2: Voice input via Telegram bot: Simply tell the bot what you ate; it uses OpenAI to recognize speech and suggests adding the product to your diary.
FAQ.List2_3: Stats and reports: Track how many calories and nutrients you've consumed over various time periods (today, week, month).
FAQ.List2_4: Product search (MeiliSearch): Find nearly any product in our comprehensive database of both standard and user-created entries.
FAQ.List2_5: Edit and delete entries: If you need to correct or remove a record, you can do so quickly and easily.
FAQ.Section3: 3. Do I need to download an app on my smartphone?
FAQ.List3_1: A web application that runs in your browser on both computers and phones.
FAQ.List3_2: A Telegram bot that you can interact with directly — no extra software needed.
FAQ.AdditionalText3: In the future, we may release a dedicated mobile app, but our core functionality is already available via the web and the bot.
FAQ.Section4Text: We use OpenAI's API (such as Whisper or GPT-based models) to convert your voice message into text. Then the bot analyzes that text, finds relevant products in the database, and suggests adding them to your diary. We do not store your audio files after processing.
FAQ.Section5: 5. What are the available sign-in methods?
FAQ.List5_2: Google OAuth (sign in quickly without creating a new password).
FAQ.List5_3: Linking your Telegram account to your web profile for seamless data sync.
FAQ.Section6: 6. Do you store the details of what I eat?
FAQ.Section6Text: We only keep the information necessary for the food diary functionality: your list of products, quantities, and consumption times. This data is accessible only in your personal account (and via the bot when authenticated). We do not share it with third parties or make it public.
FAQ.Section7: 7. Is it free to use the app?
FAQ.Section7Text: The core features (calorie tracking, adding products, basic stats) are free. The Telegram bot is a paid feature, but it includes 10 free requests. Additional bot requests require a premium subscription, which will also offer expanded features. We will announce any changes in advance.
FAQ.Section8: 8. I found an error in the calorie table. How can I fix it?
FAQ.List8_1: If it's a user-created product, you can edit it in the web interface.
FAQ.List8_2: Otherwise, let us know via the feedback form. We'll review and update the data.
FAQ.Section9: 9. Can I scan barcodes or recognize food by photos?
FAQ.Section9Text: Photo recognition and barcode scanning are on our development roadmap. We're considering adding these features when we release a mobile app or a PWA (Progressive Web App). Currently, they are not implemented.
FAQ.Section10: 10. How do you ensure data security?
FAQ.Section10Text: We use HTTPS for secure data transmission between the client and server, and limit database access to trusted personnel/services. For Google OAuth users, we do not store passwords; authentication happens directly through Google. Our goal is to maintain high standards of security and privacy.
FAQ.Section11: 11. What if I don't want to use the Telegram bot?
FAQ.Section11Text: That's totally fine. You can rely solely on the web application, which provides the same fundamental functionalities: adding products, editing records, reviewing stats, etc.
FAQ.List12_1: Web interface: works on all modern desktop and mobile browsers.
FAQ.List12_2: Telegram bot: available on any device that supports Telegram (iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux, etc.).
FAQ.List13_2: Use the Contact Us button in the web interface
FAQ.List13_3: In the Telegram bot, use button Feedback
FAQ.Section14: 14. Do you plan to grow further?
FAQ.Section14Text: Yes, we are continuously improving both the bot and the web application. We're developing premium features (advanced analytics, photo recognition) and exploring additional integrations. Stay tuned for updates and announcements!
FAQ.ConclusionText: We hope this FAQ covers your main questions about Calories365. If you have more questions or ideas, feel free to reach out via any of our contact channels. Thank you for using Calories365 to track your diet and health!
